alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 21 at 9:05PM MST until September 22 at 7:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST THURSDAY... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of south central Arizona and southeast Arizona, including the following counties, in south central Arizona, Maricopa. In southeast Arizona, Pinal. * WHEN...Until 900 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Motorists should avoid Warren Road and Val Vista Road, where Vekol Wash flooded this afternoon. Low-water crossings are inundated with water and may not be passable. Expect some areas of slow moving or standing water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 905 PM MST, Local law enforcement reported heavy rain in Vekol Wash due to thunderstorms. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain fell earlier today. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Maricopa, Freeman and Ak-Chin Village. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
